name: Bitcoin Bridged NEDX from BNB
description: BTC.n represents the Bitcoin-denominated asset within the NEDX ecosystem, built to enable efficient on-chain transfers and integration with DeFi features such as swaps, liquidity, and trading pairs. BTC.n provides a streamlined way to use BTC-based value inside NEDX applications while benefiting from fast confirmations, low friction transactions, and ecosystem-wide interoperability. It is commonly used for market pairs, portfolio exposure, and ecosystem settlement.
